# init(forWritingWith:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an archiver to encode data into a given a mutable-data object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(forWritingWith data: NSMutableData)
```

## Parameters

- **data**: The mutable-data object into which the archive is written.

## Discussion

When you finish encoding data, you must invoke [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSKeyedArchiver/finishEncoding()] at which point `data` is filled. The format of the receiver is `NSPropertyListBinaryFormat_v1_0`.

## Related Documentation

- **Archives and Serializations Programming Guide**

## Creating a Keyed Archiver

- **init(requiringSecureCoding:)**: Creates an archiver to encode data, and optionally disables secure coding.
- **init()**: Initializes an archiver to encode data.
